name: Wood (giganlak, darkitxu84, lucyy_pwp)
description:
A survival text game where you can explore areas, obtain resources, sell and buy goods, unlock new areas, obtain ores in the mine, build structures, forge items, upgrade your tools and much more.

Credits to:

giganlak - Original programmer, direction counselor, soundtrack composer and creator of Wood.

ConaII_ - Head programmer, made most of 2.0, code optimizer and creator of woodRewritten.

darkitxu84 - Side programmer, main beta tester, code bugfixer and icon designer.

It'll be REALLY appreciated if you share this game with as many people as you can! You could even appear in the Special Thanks menu in the game!
